summary: This document appears to be a forwarded email chain containing a signed application or affidavit for an amended warrant related to drives from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence. It is part of legal proceedings in the US District Court for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Application for Amended Warrant Filed
events.description: A signed application/affidavit for an amended warrant for three drives from Epstein's New York residence was submitted to the US District Court for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: A legal application for an amended warrant was filed on October 27, 2020.
The warrant sought access to three drives from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.
The document is part of proceedings in the US District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The document reference EFTA00089667 suggests it is part of the Epstein case document set.
